title: Add ArgumentSpec data structure and tests, Add simple shape propagation
body_html:
The ArgumentSpec data-structure will be used as the key in GraphExecutor's
code cache. It supports fast creation, hashing, and equality checking
because it will run on all inputs to GraphExecutors in the hot path.

The second commit add simple shape propagation, computing sizes, strides, and types of outputs given inputs. It just runs fake versions of the ops to do so to keep it simple.
body_text:
The ArgumentSpec data-structure will be used as the key in GraphExecutor's
code cache. It supports fast creation, hashing, and equality checking
because it will run on all inputs to GraphExecutors in the hot path.
The second commit add simple shape propagation, computing sizes, strides, and types of outputs given inputs. It just runs fake versions of the ops to do so to keep it simple.
body:
The ArgumentSpec data-structure will be used as the key in GraphExecutor's
code cache. It supports fast creation, hashing, and equality checking
because it will run on all inputs to GraphExecutors in the hot path.

The second commit add simple shape propagation, computing sizes, strides, and types of outputs given inputs. It just runs fake versions of the ops to do so to keep it simple.
